name: WordPress
support: Open Source, Supported by most hosting companies
limitations: Security issues with plugins and updates

name: Drupal
capabilities: Highly customizable, strong security, API for developers

name: Wix
capabilities: Drag-and-drop builder, integrated hosting, e-commerce features
limitations: Limited customization, proprietary code, not open-source

name: Shopify
capabilities: E-commerce features, themes, plugins, payment integration
limitations: Monthly fees, transaction fees, limited customization
